name: Portal Defect
description:
• Its your job to survive and complete your mission.
  • Procedural generated worlds will keep you on your toes... or knees
  • 10+ weapons and 20+ spells... find the best combo
  • you Die? you Restart from scratch!... God bless Permadeath
  • Play with a friend (Multiplayer comes end of Early Access/full Release)
Portal Defect is still in Early Access. I will gradually fix bugs, add more content, and overall polish the gameplay.
Thank you for your support! I will try my best to make a game you want to return to as often as you can :)
